Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The weak electron - donating characteristic of TA , which has 2-D extended conjugation by thiophene side groups , makes the copolymer exhibit a low - lying HOMO level of -5.5 eV with a low band - gap of 1.65 eV , which affords both high photo - voltage and photocurrent of the polymer solar cells.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| 2-D extended conjugation |
| low-lying HOMO level |
| -5.5 eV (HOMO level) |
| low band-gap |
| 1.65 eV (band-gap) |
| high photo-voltage |
| high photocurrent |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| 2-D extended conjugation |
| low-lying HOMO level |
| low band-gap |
| high photo-voltage |
| high photocurrent |

Explanation:

* "2-D extended conjugation" is a material property of TA.
* "Low-lying HOMO level" and "low band-gap" are material properties of the copolymer.
* "High photo-voltage" and "high photocurrent" are material properties of the polymer solar cells.
* "Thiophene side groups" and "-5.5 eV" are not material properties, so they have been removed.
